title: Fully-Furnished 3BHK at Grande Tower : Apartment for Rent in Tokha, Kathmandu
owner_notes: contract period Minimum 1 year and preferred for family
description:
3BHK Fully- Furnished Apartment for rent in Tokha, Kathmandu,Nepal.

3BHK fully furnished Grande Tower, an affordable well-designed apartment is for rent in the heart of Kathmandu city which is located in a premium business hub,  near Samakhusi, Gongabu, Basundhara. Grande Tower apartment is located nearby "Grande International Hospital" and is about 2.5 km north from Ring road. 

This well furnished  3BHK Apartment in 4th Floor (Uranus tower 4 C ) comes with finest furniture and interiors which is built on total area of 1514 Sq.ft. This apartment is for rent which is suitable for Residential Purpose and have a good environment for a happy and comfortable living. Since, this property is north-east faced, so we can expect plenty of sunlight and fresh air to stimulate a better , pleasant environment.

Grande Tower Apartments is designed and perfected for you to live and experience a very peaceful, well managed and highly facilitated society, with facilities like easy transportation access, well facilitated market place nearby, hospitals and educational centers in a nearest distance to Grande Tower. 

Floor Plans :

  • 3 bedrooms
  • 1 spacious living
  • 1 kitchen and dinning
  • 2 bathrooms
  • 4 balcony

Features :

  • Water well
  • drainage
  • ample parking space
  • modular kitchen
  • garbage
  • lift
  • Community hall

title: Cottage Built In 10 Ropanis For Sale In Lamatar : House for Sale in Lamatar, Lalitpur
property_name: Cottage Built In 10 Ropanis For Sale In Lamatar
tags: Cottage Built In 10 Ropanis For Sale In Lamatar
description:
Cottage built in 10 ropanis for sale in Lamatar Lalitpur. This cottage is located in a very beautiful place in Lamatar near Green Vally Housing Lamatar. Kathmandu city and the Himalayan ranges can be seen clearly from the cottage. On the right -hand side from the Lubhu to Lamatar Road, it reaches this house at a distance of about 1KM. The house is captivated by the variety of trees, fruits, and the green garden.

The house has only a floor, It has two bedrooms including a master bedroom with an attached bathroom. A spacious living room, dining room, and kitchen are next to the living room. There is also a common bathroom and washing is inside the house. It has verandas around the four directions.

title: Commercial Land : Land for Sale in Hattisar, Kathmandu
description:
Commercial Land for sale in Hattisar, Kathmandu, Nepal.
Commercial land available for sale in Hattisar, Kathmandu, Nepal, which covers a total land area of 13 aana 2 paisa 2 daam. This land for sale offers alternatives that will assist you and your business as optimally as possible on their own way, which is situated at prime business area in Kathmandu and is also suitable for residential purpose. This Land in Hattisar, Kathmandu is touched by road from two sides, among which west faced road length 20 feet and east faced road also 16 feet. 

It faces east direction, so we can expect plenty of sunlight and fresh air to stimulate a better, pleasant environment. The environment of this land creates a different kind of energy and is placed at a unique place, aimed at supporting a deeper connection to the time you spend at your home or commercial space. This land for sale is located centrally at the heart of Kathmandu, near Siddhartha bank and 500 m ahead of Jay Nepal Hall  This land has all the basic facilities like electricity pole, drainage point, water supply point needed for a peaceful and well managed commercial building. You can have a dream building or commercial space right at your choice so delay can cost you a great opportunities.

Nearby :
